title: Darwin's Dangerous Idea
description: A quick, practical guide to Darwin's Dangerous Idea.

hook.text: On the Origin of Species has been banned, burned, and battled over for 165 years. Evolution still makes people nervous.

discovery.text: Religious authorities immediately attacked it. Yugoslavia, Greece, and parts of the U.S. banned its teaching.

twist.text: The 1925 Scopes Trial put a teacher on trial for teaching evolution in Tennessee â€” and the debate still hasn't ended.

climax.text: Today, several U.S. states still attempt to limit how evolution is taught in public schools.

punchline.text: The most proven theory in biology is still banned somewhere.

quiz.question: What was the Scopes Trial about?
options: A teacher prosecuted for teaching evolution
A publisher sued for printing Darwin's book
A scientist defending natural selection theory
